headline: Aptiv PLC (APTV) Increases Despite Market Slip: Here's What You Need to Know
summary: The latest trading day saw Aptiv PLC (APTV) settling at $78.83, representing a +1.31% change from its previous close.

headline: Here’s What Barclays Thinks About Aptiv PLC (APTV)
summary: ​Aptiv PLC (NYSE:APTV) is one of the Best Autonomous Vehicle Stocks to Buy Now. On January 23, Dan Levy from Barclays reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $105 price target. Earlier, on January 21, Colin Rusch from Oppenheimer also reiterated a Buy rating on Aptiv PLC (NYSE:APTV) and raised the price target […]
